pr_title: Dropping guava and appcompat dependency from FIS SDK.

timeline.message: Dropping guava and appcompat dependency from FIS SDK.

timeline.bodyText:
Can we make this uppercase this time?
I know that would mean I have to submit a new CL in Google3...
Ok, as discussed offline:
Let's not do it.
We can discuss after the successful release.
timeline.author: andirayo
